item.title: FHIR Takes Off as ONC Teases Upcoming Data Blocking Definitions
item.description: ONC official Steven Posnack explains how FHIR is taking hold as the industry waits for the ONC’s proposals to tackle data blocking. Read on healthitanalytics.com
